challenge:
Near the door to the hidden abode
Where stored goods lie, you shall find the code
A Roof

Hours of joy and fun
You've had here, under the sun
Climb here to be done

Those who've helped you faithfully
Now celebrate festivities
The code is hidden in their tree

Where you sat during your breaks
Now a hiding spot makes
The cold hard surface hides a secret
But you must look beneath it.

The sum of many hours of workmen's toils
To move, now here you meet to find the spoils

Previously here you met,
But in another place I'M set,
If you were hungry, here me you'd get

The third of three, you rarely see
Behind the Grill, you will find me (9)

In plain view, you'll find me
You just have to read me

Here your trusty book holder
Sat while you were growing taller
Now below them, slightly smaller
Lies the code you seek.
I keep the staff cool.
Look up towards Year 4, but not on the same floor

Do you spy inside an office,
The code I hide, set off, is
You'll have to recover to read this code
You'd do well to discard this one.

The legacy of a peer,
I'm here

A door you've passed through many times
A door that's often locked
They're near my code.
I'm near the fletching.

All I want is to test your memory,
Did you see me?
